description: Kombucha Sangria is a refreshing and healthy twist on the classic Spanish cocktail.&nbsp;Kombucha is a fermented tea that is naturally carbonated and has probiotic benefits. This recipe uses white wine, brandy, and fresh fruits to create a delicious and healthy sangria. It is also packed with probiotics, which are beneficial for gut health.
